content.title: Project Update: Thank You & Pledgebox Survey Coming SoonÔºÅ
content.creator:
ScopePro
March 18, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are thrilled to announce that our project, Vortix Titanium Air Blower: Turn On the Turbulence, has officially come to a successful conclusion! First and foremost, we want to extend our deepest gratitude to each and every one of you for your incredible support, enthusiasm, and trust in bringing this innovative product to life. None of this would have been possible without you.
In one week, we will be sending out the Pledgebox survey to collect your shipping information and finalize shipping fees. Please keep an eye on your email inbox and complete the survey promptly to ensure a smooth delivery process. Your timely response will help us get your rewards to you as quickly as possible.
Once again, thank you for being a part of this exciting journey. We can‚Äôt wait for you to experience the power of the Vortix Titanium Air Blower!
Stay tuned for more updates, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
Package sample

Whether you‚Äôre cleaning photography or video equipment or maintaining electronic devices, it strikes the perfect balance between innovative design and top-tier performance.
Once again, thank you for your support and trust. We can‚Äôt wait to get the Vortix into your hands and hear your feedback!
